title: Projects
text:
Cleaned and analyzed various NBA datasets to determine if there is a correlation between draft ranking and player performance using Google Sheets, Tableau, and R to display results. Summarized, simplified, and explained results in a published article.
Link to github for this project.

title: Projects
text:
Cleaned and analyzed various NBA datasets to determine if there is a correlation between draft ranking and player performance using Google Sheets, Tableau, and R to display results. Summarized, simplified, and explained results in a published article.
Link to github for this project.

title: Projects
text:
Math 42
Worked with a team to examine the methodology and results of using logistic and LASSO regression to predict wildfire occurrences and burned areas based on various relevant variables. Cleaned a dataset of 517 wildfires, coded and applied regression models, tested and trained the dataset, and analyzed the predictive models. Summarized and graphed results and noted improvements that could be made.
Link to github for this project.

title: Chloe Kim
text: I am currently a fourth year student at University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) majoring in Statistics and Data Science and minoring in Mathematics.
